minerinfo.total_hash: tail -100 ${NVOC}/nvoc_logs/screenlog.0 | grep Shares | grep "[M]H/s" | sed -r 's/\x1B\[([0-9]{1,2}(;[0-9]{1,2})?)?[m|K]//g' | grep -o '[0-9]*.[0-9]* MH/s' | sed 's:MH/s::' | awk '{s+=$1} END {printf "%.0f", s}'
minerinfo.hash_count: tail -100 ${NVOC}/nvoc_logs/screenlog.0 | grep Speed | grep -v grep | wc -l | awk '{print $1}'
minerinfo.rejected_shares: tail -100 ${NVOC}/nvoc_logs/screenlog.0 | grep "Shares:" | grep -o "R:[0-9]*.[0-9]*%" | cut - f2 - -d: | tail - 1
